titles.title: To recognize and honor the world's nearly 20,000,000 refugees.
To recognize and honor the world's nearly 20,000,000 refugees.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on International Relations.

term.name: Civil Rights and Liberties, Minority Issues

bill.summary: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that: (1) World Refugee Day is dedicated to recognize and honor refugees throughout the world; (2) within the framework of international solidarity, there should be better refugee protection; and (3) all refugees should be treated with respect for their human rights and dignity.
